dict.acceptation: 出席；致力于，献身于；侍候，照顾；关注；
出席，参加；[常用被动语态]（作为结果、情况）伴随；照顾；陪伴；

sent.orig: I have your interests to attend to, as you can't attend to them yourself.
sent.trans: 我还得为你操心打算呢，你呀，根本就没有本事自己打天下。

sent.orig: There exist some rare students attend boarding schools but the majority attend public schools.
sent.trans: 只有极少数学生就读于寄宿学校，大多数学生还是在公立学校学习。

sent.orig: People who regularly attend church, will probably attend a special church service on Good Friday.
sent.trans: 通常呢在这一天人民会去教堂，参加一些教堂的礼拜。

sent.orig: Attend youth volunteer, attend a twice public-spirited activity.
sent.trans: 参加青年志愿者，参加两次公益活动。

sent.orig: Disabled adults attend during one month. Disabled children attend during another month.
sent.trans: 残疾的成年人在此度假一个月，残疾儿童则度假另一个月。
